leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算化学-量化计算与工作流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 求解→批量运行→解析/后处理→验证→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 求解器 + 工作流/调度 + 解析器

unit.unit_name: 近似/代理/Δ-ML 加速工具

queries: [WEB] machine learning potentials computational chemistry github
[WEB] neural network force field tools github
[WEB] ml surrogate models for dft github
[WEB] accelerating quantum chemistry with machine learning github

tools.name: Equivariant-NN-Zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Library for building equivariant neural networks with implementations and examples
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to facilitate the construction of equivariant neural networks, providing a zoo of implementations and examples useful for geometric deep learning in scientific domains.

tools.name: ACEpotentials.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials with Atomic Cluster Expansion in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation for creating and using Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials based on the Atomic Cluster Expansion (ACE) framework.

tools.name: MACE
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials with higher order equivariant message passing
tools.detailed_description: MACE provides fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials utilizing higher order equivariant message passing neural networks for atomistic modeling.

tools.name: mace-foundations
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation models for MACE (MP, OMAT, Matpes)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of foundation models (MP, OMAT, Matpes) for the MACE interatomic potential framework, serving as pre-trained weights and configurations.

tools.name: mace-jax
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant machine learning interatomic potentials in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX implementation of the MACE equivariant machine learning interatomic potentials, enabling accelerated training and inference.

tools.name: mace-layer
tools.one_line_profile: Higher order equivariant graph neural networks for 3D point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A library providing higher order equivariant graph neural network layers specifically designed for processing 3D point clouds in scientific applications.

tools.name: mace-off
tools.one_line_profile: MACE-OFF23 models repository
tools.detailed_description: Repository containing the MACE-OFF23 models, providing specific pre-trained potentials for the MACE framework.

tools.name: MOFSimBench
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluating universal machine learning interatomic potentials in metal-organic framework molecular modeling
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating the performance of universal machine learning interatomic potentials specifically in the context of metal-organic framework (MOF) molecular modeling.

tools.name: nablaDFT
tools.one_line_profile: Large-Scale Conformational Energy and Hamiltonian Prediction benchmark and dataset
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark and dataset for large-scale conformational energy and Hamiltonian prediction, facilitating the development and evaluation of ML models in quantum chemistry.

tools.name: charge3net
tools.one_line_profile: Higher-order equivariant neural networks for charge density prediction in materials
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of higher-order equivariant neural networks specifically designed for predicting charge density distributions in materials.

tools.name: ESP_DNN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-Convolutional Deep Neural Network for predicting electrostatic potential surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A Graph-Convolutional Deep Neural Network developed for the prediction of electrostatic potential surfaces of molecules, aiding in drug design and molecular interaction studies.

tools.name: EquiPNAS
tools.one_line_profile: pLM-informed E(3) equivariant deep graph neural networks for protein-nucleic acid binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing pLM-informed E(3) equivariant deep graph neural networks to predict binding sites between proteins and nucleic acids.

tools.name: EnQA
tools.one_line_profile: 3D-equivariant neural network for protein structure accuracy estimation
tools.detailed_description: A 3D-equivariant neural network designed to estimate the accuracy of protein structures, serving as a quality assessment tool in structural biology.

tools.name: biomed-multi-view
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Molecular Embedding with Late Fusion (MMELON) architecture
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the MMELON architecture which combines molecular representations from image, graph, and text views to learn a joint embedding for chemical and biological property prediction.

tools.name: PES-Learn
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Generation of Machine Learning Models of Molecular Potential Energy Surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A package for the automated generation of machine learning models representing molecular potential energy surfaces, streamlining the creation of ML potentials.

tools.name: CHGNet
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained universal neural network potential for charge-informed atomistic modeling
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained universal neural network potential that incorporates charge information for accurate atomistic modeling of materials.

tools.name: n2p2
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Network Potential Package
tools.detailed_description: A C++ package for training and using neural network potentials for atomistic simulations, widely used in computational physics and chemistry.

tools.name: Clifford Group Equivariant Neural Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Library for building Clifford Group Equivariant Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Clifford Group Equivariant Neural Networks, designed for geometric deep learning tasks involving O(n), SO(n), and E(n) symmetries, which are essential in physics and chemistry modeling.

tools.name: e3nn.jl
tools.one_line_profile: E(3)-equivariant graph neural networks implementation for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for creating E(3)-equivariant graph neural networks, enabling the processing of 3D geometric data with rotation and translation invariance, widely used in computational chemistry and materials science.

tools.name: SOG-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Sum-of-Gaussians Neural Network for ML force fields
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight neural network framework designed to integrate long-range interactions into machine learning force fields using a Sum-of-Gaussians approach, improving accuracy for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: ASD
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for converting acceleration records to displacements
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for signal processing that converts acceleration time series data into displacement records, useful in structural engineering and seismology analysis.

tools.name: PNVmaps
tools.one_line_profile: Global Maps of Potential Natural Vegetation generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A project providing code and methodology to generate global maps of Potential Natural Vegetation (PNV) using machine learning techniques applied to environmental data.

tools.name: FitSNAP
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for machine-learning interatomic potentials for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A software package designed to generate machine-learning interatomic potentials (SNAP) for use with the LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulation engine, automating the training and fitting process.

tools.name: MatDeepLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks package for materials chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing a suite of graph neural network models and utilities specifically tailored for applications in materials chemistry and property prediction.

tools.name: FastEGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Improved Equivariant Graph Neural Networks implementation
tools.detailed_description: Source code for FastEGNN, a method improving equivariant graph neural networks on large geometric graphs via virtual nodes learning, applicable to molecular and geometric modeling.

tools.name: HEGNN
tools.one_line_profile: High-degree Equivariant Graph Neural Network implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of HEGNN, a high-degree equivariant graph neural network designed to capture complex geometric features in scientific data.

tools.name: meta-learning-qsar
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-Learning GNN Initializations for QSAR
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing meta-learning strategies for initializing Graph Neural Networks to improve molecular property prediction (QSAR) in low-resource settings.

tools.name: PhysNet_Thermal_Models
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural networks for building thermal modeling
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) specifically designed for control-oriented thermal modeling of buildings, integrating physical laws with data-driven approaches.

tools.name: MolCap-Arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Language-Enhanced Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive captioning benchmark suite for evaluating language-enhanced molecular property prediction models, facilitating the development of multi-modal chemical AI.

tools.name: Coastal Erosion RNN
tools.one_line_profile: RNN-based model for predicting coastal shoreline changes
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework using Recurrent Neural Networks to model and forecast coastal erosion trends based on historical satellite-derived shoreline data.

tools.name: Protify
tools.one_line_profile: Low-code tool for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A low-code framework designed to simplify the process of molecular property prediction, making machine learning models accessible for chemistry applications.

tools.name: GS-Meta
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Sampling-based Meta-Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for Graph Sampling-based Meta-Learning, a method to improve molecular property prediction performance, particularly in few-shot learning scenarios.

tools.name: Skin Cancer Classification
tools.one_line_profile: CNN-based skin lesion classification model
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning implementation using Convolutional Neural Networks to classify skin lesions and detect potential skin cancer from dermatology images.

tools.name: Suicidal Ideation Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: NLP model for detecting suicidal ideation from text
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning system designed to identify early signs of suicidal ideation from textual behavioral data, serving as a potential screening tool for mental health.

tools.name: aenet-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between aenet ANN potentials and LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: An interface module and patch enabling the use of Artificial Neural Network (ANN) potentials trained with aenet within the LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulation package.

tools.name: EquiHGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Rotationally Equivariant Hypergraph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Rotationally Equivariant Hypergraph Neural Networks, designed to handle complex multi-body interactions in geometric data with rotational symmetry.

tools.name: EquiMesh
tools.one_line_profile: E(3)-Equivariant Mesh Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A neural network architecture for processing mesh data with E(3) equivariance, suitable for simulations involving 3D surfaces and deformations in physics and engineering.

tools.name: TESGraph
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Temporal Equivariant Scene Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of TESGNN, a model for learning from dynamic 3D scenes with temporal and geometric equivariance, applicable to physical dynamics prediction.

tools.name: EquiTriton
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance kernels for equivariant neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A library providing optimized Triton kernels for common operations in equivariant neural networks, enabling faster training and inference for scientific machine learning models.

tools.name: fastprop
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Molecular Property Prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid molecular property prediction utilizing descriptors from mordredcommunity, designed to provide quick baseline models for cheminformatics tasks.

tools.name: DPmoire
tools.one_line_profile: ML force field construction for moiré systems
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for constructing accurate machine learning force fields specifically for moiré superlattice systems in condensed matter physics.

tools.name: CatBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for ML Potentials in Adsorption Energy
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark framework for evaluating the performance of machine learning interatomic potentials specifically in the context of adsorption energy predictions for catalysis.

tools.name: equivariant_electron_density
tools.one_line_profile: Electron density prediction with Euclidean Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate and predict molecular electron densities using Euclidean Neural Networks, enabling fast quantum chemical property estimation.

tools.name: cp2k_2_deepmdkit
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from CP2K output to DeepMD-kit input
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool that facilitates the workflow between ab initio calculations (CP2K) and machine learning potential training (DeepMD-kit) by converting data formats.

tools.name: GraphCW
tools.one_line_profile: Self-interpretable GNN for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: An explainable AI tool for drug discovery that uses Concept Whitening to create self-interpretable Graph Neural Networks for predicting molecular properties.

tools.name: 3D-PGT
tools.one_line_profile: Automated 3D Pre-Training for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for automated 3D pre-training of graph neural networks, designed to enhance the accuracy of molecular property predictions in downstream tasks.

tools.name: ABT-MPNN
tools.one_line_profile: Atom-bond transformer-based MPNN for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: A message passing neural network architecture incorporating atom-bond transformers to capture complex molecular interactions for accurate property prediction.

tools.name: PhysNet_DER
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Evidential Regression for PhysNet
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Deep Evidential Regression applied to the PhysNet model, enabling uncertainty quantification in machine learning predictions of molecular properties.

tools.name: MatPL
tools.one_line_profile: Material Potential Library (formerly PWMLFF)
tools.detailed_description: A software package for generating machine learning force fields with accuracy comparable to Ab Initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD), supporting rapid material simulations.

tools.name: SIMPLE-NN
tools.one_line_profile: SNU Interatomic Machine-learning PotentiaL packagE
tools.detailed_description: A package for training and using neural network-based interatomic potentials, facilitating efficient molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: SPINNER
tools.one_line_profile: Structure Prediction of Inorganic crystals using NN potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the structure of inorganic crystals by combining neural network potentials with evolutionary and random search algorithms.

tools.name: SevenNet
tools.one_line_profile: GNN interatomic potential for multi-GPU MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based interatomic potential package optimized for efficient, multi-GPU parallel molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: ConvDecoder
tools.one_line_profile: Un-trained neural network for accelerated MRI
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of an un-trained convolutional neural network architecture used as a prior for image reconstruction tasks, specifically applied to accelerated MRI.

tools.name: PhysNet
tools.one_line_profile: Code for training PhysNet models
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation for training PhysNet, a neural network architecture for predicting energies, forces, and dipole moments of molecules.

tools.name: k_SRME
tools.one_line_profile: Heat-conductivity benchmark for ML potentials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating the accuracy of foundational machine-learning potentials in predicting heat conductivity (kappa) via the spectral reconstruction method.

tools.name: PyXtal_FF
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning Interatomic Potential Predictions
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for developing and using machine learning interatomic potentials, supporting various descriptors and regression methods for materials simulation.

tools.name: MolPROP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction fusing language and graph representations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that integrates molecular language models with graph neural networks (GNNs) to enhance molecular representation learning for accurate property prediction.

tools.name: ml-dft
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning approximations for density functional theory
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to accelerate Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations by using machine learning models to approximate density functionals, enabling faster electronic structure analysis.

tools.name: Deep Energy Method (DEM)
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network solver for nonlinear elasticity PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A physics-informed neural network approach that solves partial differential equations in nonlinear elasticity at finite strain by minimizing potential energy, serving as a surrogate for finite element analysis.

tools.name: Topological Equivariant Networks
tools.one_line_profile: E(n)-Equivariant Topological Neural Networks implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of E(n)-Equivariant Topological Neural Networks, designed to learn representations of geometric data (like molecules) while respecting topological and Euclidean symmetries.

tools.name: S-CGIB
tools.one_line_profile: Subgraph-conditioned Graph Information Bottleneck for molecules
tools.detailed_description: A pre-training architecture for Graph Neural Networks that utilizes a subgraph-conditioned Information Bottleneck approach to improve molecular property prediction performance.

tools.name: KERMT
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained GNN for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network model pretrained on large-scale molecular datasets, designed to be fine-tuned for various downstream molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: cuEquivariance
tools.one_line_profile: CUDA-accelerated primitives for equivariant neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance library providing CUDA kernels and tensor operations to accelerate equivariant neural networks used in scientific modeling (e.g., DiffDock, MACE, Allegro).

tools.name: SpookyNet
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning force fields with electronic degrees of freedom
tools.detailed_description: A reference implementation of SpookyNet, a deep learning model for constructing interatomic potentials that explicitly includes electronic degrees of freedom and nonlocal effects.

tools.name: DeepPulse-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Neural networks for remote pulse measurement (rPPG)
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of deep learning models for remote photoplethysmography (rPPG), enabling the extraction of physiological signals (heart rate) from video data.

tools.name: PennyLane
tools.one_line_profile: Library for quantum machine learning and quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform Python library for differentiable programming of quantum computers, widely used for quantum machine learning, quantum chemistry simulations, and quantum optimization.

tools.name: HamGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant GNN for electronic Hamiltonian prediction
tools.detailed_description: An E(3)-equivariant Graph Neural Network designed to predict the electronic Hamiltonian matrix of molecules, accelerating quantum chemistry calculations by bypassing expensive SCF iterations.

tools.name: ML-DFT (Ramprasad Group)
tools.one_line_profile: ML prediction of electronic structure for polymers
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning toolkit for predicting the electronic structure and atomic properties (potential energy, forces, stress tensor) specifically for nitrogen and oxygen-containing polymers.

tools.name: DeepDelta
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise deep learning for molecular property difference prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach based on Chemprop that processes molecule pairs to predict property differences (Delta learning), improving accuracy in low-data regimes or for activity cliffs.

tools.name: NNP-MM
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for TorchANI NNP with NAMD
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and tools to interface TorchANI neural network potentials (NNP) with the NAMD molecular dynamics engine, enabling QM/MM-style simulations with ML potentials.

tools.name: MLFF-Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology ML Force Field Framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework provided by SAIT for developing and deploying machine learning force fields (MLFF) for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: EGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Edge-Featured Graph Attention Network for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of an Edge-Featured Graph Attention Network (EGAT) specifically designed for chemical reaction prediction and molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: Surrogates.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and optimization library for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for building surrogate models (kriging, radial basis functions, neural networks, etc.) to approximate expensive scientific simulations, part of the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: uq_molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for applying Bayesian deep learning techniques to quantify uncertainty in molecular property predictions, enhancing the reliability of ML models in chemistry.

tools.name: mol_property
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning based pKa prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the pKa values of chemical structures using machine learning approaches and molecular similarity analysis.

tools.name: LieNeurons
tools.one_line_profile: Adjoint-Equivariant Neural Networks for Lie Algebras
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of neural networks that are equivariant to semi-simple Lie Algebra actions, applicable in physics (particle physics) and robotics for learning symmetric dynamics.

tools.name: HimGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical molecular representation learning framework for property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A hierarchical graph neural network model designed to learn molecular representations for predicting molecular properties, capturing multi-scale structural information.

tools.name: SGGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal representation learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a multi-modal learning framework combining sequence, graph, and geometry information for accurate molecular property prediction.

tools.name: PaiNN-SLI
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network potentials for accelerated metadynamics at interfaces
tools.detailed_description: Source code for training neural network potentials specifically designed for accelerating metadynamics simulations of oxygen reduction kinetics at Au-Water interfaces.

tools.name: SigmaCCS
tools.one_line_profile: Collision cross section prediction using graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for highly accurate and large-scale prediction of collision cross sections (CCS) to assist in compound identification in metabolomics and chemistry.

tools.name: FraGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-oriented multi-scale graph attention model
tools.detailed_description: A molecular property prediction model that utilizes a fragment-oriented multi-scale graph attention mechanism to capture structural features.

tools.name: chemprop-uncertainty
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for neural molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: An extension/fork of Chemprop focused on fast and scalable uncertainty quantification for molecular property prediction and guided virtual screening.

tools.name: GeomGCL
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric graph contrastive learning for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a geometric graph contrastive learning framework to enhance molecular representation learning for property prediction tasks.

tools.name: AIMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Atoms In Molecules Neural Network Potential
tools.detailed_description: A modular neural network potential implementation based on the Atoms-in-Molecules (AIM) concept for accurate and transferable interatomic potentials.

tools.name: TorchANI
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of ANI neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library for training and using ANI-style neural network interatomic potentials, enabling accurate molecular simulations.

tools.name: FERNN
tools.one_line_profile: Flow Equivariant Recurrent Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Flow Equivariant Recurrent Neural Networks, designed for learning dynamics of physical systems while respecting symmetries.

tools.name: Drug3D-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-temporal gated attention for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model incorporating spatial-temporal gated attention mechanisms to predict molecular properties based on 3D molecular geometry.

tools.name: apax
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for training machine learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: A flexible and performant framework designed for training and deploying machine learning interatomic potentials in JAX.

tools.name: MCGLPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric representation learning for protein-protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: Integration of molecular coarse-grained models into a geometric representation learning framework for predicting properties of protein-protein complexes.

tools.name: ChemXploreML
tools.one_line_profile: Desktop application for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based desktop application designed for researchers to perform molecular property prediction and analysis with a graphical interface.

tools.name: active-learning-md
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for ML potential generation
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for generating machine learning interatomic potentials driven by active learning, demonstrated on amorphous and liquid systems.

tools.name: equiadapt
tools.one_line_profile: Library for making neural networks equivariant
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to adapt existing neural network architectures to be equivariant, facilitating their application in physics and chemistry tasks.

tools.name: mlip-arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark platform for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A fair and transparent benchmarking framework for evaluating machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) beyond basic error metrics.

tools.name: SchNetPack
tools.one_line_profile: Deep neural networks for atomistic systems
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library for atomistic systems, enabling the prediction of potential energy surfaces and other quantum chemical properties.

tools.name: G-SchNet
tools.one_line_profile: Generative neural networks for 3D molecules
tools.detailed_description: An extension of SchNetPack for generating 3D molecular structures using autoregressive neural networks.

tools.name: aenet
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic Energy NETwork
tools.detailed_description: A package for the construction and usage of atomic interaction potentials based on artificial neural networks.

tools.name: DGL-LifeSci
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for chemistry and biology
tools.detailed_description: A DGL-based package for applying graph neural networks to tasks in chemistry and biology, including molecular property prediction and generation.

tools.name: aqml
tools.one_line_profile: Amons-based quantum machine learning library for quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Amons-based quantum machine learning (AQML) for predicting properties of organic molecules with quantum chemical accuracy.

tools.name: MolRep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep representation learning library for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library for deep representation learning on molecules, integrating state-of-the-art models for molecular property prediction and drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: BAMBOO
tools.one_line_profile: AI-driven machine learning force field for electrolyte simulations
tools.detailed_description: BAMBOO (Bytedance AI Molecular BOOster) is a machine learning force field designed for precise and efficient simulations of electrolytes, enabling large-scale molecular dynamics.

tools.name: CGnet
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for learning coarse-grained force fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for learning coarse-grained force fields from atomistic simulation data using neural networks.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for drug discovery and quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library that democratizes deep learning for science, providing tools for drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology.

tools.name: DeepMD-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: GNN plugin for DeePMD-kit
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for DeePMD-kit that implements various graph neural network models for potential energy surface modeling.

tools.name: DeePMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package for generating many-body potential energy representations and performing molecular dynamics simulations with ab initio accuracy.

tools.name: DP-GEN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep potential generator workflow tool
tools.detailed_description: A concurrent learning workflow tool designed to generate deep learning-based models of interatomic potential energy and force fields automatically.

tools.name: PhaseForge
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for alloy phase diagram prediction using MLIPs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for high-throughput alloy phase diagram prediction integrating machine learning interatomic potentials with ATAT and CALPHAD modeling.

tools.name: MLatom
tools.one_line_profile: Package for AI-enhanced computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive package for atomistic machine learning simulations, offering tools for surface hopping dynamics, spectra simulation, and quantum chemical property prediction.

tools.name: e3nn-jax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX library for E(3) equivariant neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A JAX library for building Euclidean equivariant neural networks, widely used in creating machine learning interatomic potentials and molecular models.

tools.name: qcnn-hep
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum CNN package for HEP event classification
tools.detailed_description: A package demonstrating Quantum Convolutional Neural Networks (QCNN) for classifying High Energy Physics (HEP) events from particle image data.

tools.name: LorentzGroupNetwork
tools.one_line_profile: Lorentz equivariant neural network architecture
tools.detailed_description: A neural network architecture implementation that is fully equivariant with respect to transformations under the Lorentz group, designed for physics applications.

tools.name: vaspMD
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow scripts and tools for VASP AIMD and MLFF-MD calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools designed to facilitate ab initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD) and Machine Learning Force Field Molecular Dynamics (MLFF-MD) workflows using VASP. It includes utilities for input generation, simulation management, and post-processing analysis.

tools.name: mlip
tools.one_line_profile: Library for training and applying Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A software library developed by InstaDeep for the efficient training and application of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs). It supports the development of potentials for molecular dynamics and materials simulation.

tools.name: amaceing_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for CP2K and MACE-torch input generation and post-processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to streamline the workflow for atomistic simulations. It assists in creating input files for engines like CP2K, MACE-torch, MatterSim, and SevenNet, and provides tools for post-processing and evaluating simulation results.

tools.name: delfta
tools.one_line_profile: Delta-QML models for medicinal chemistry property prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Delta-Quantum Machine Learning (Delta-QML) specifically tailored for medicinal chemistry. It provides tools to predict molecular properties by learning the difference (delta) between low-level and high-level quantum mechanical calculations.

tools.name: catalyticLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Catalytic Large Atomic Model for catalysis simulations
tools.detailed_description: A machine-learning-based interatomic potential specifically designed for catalysis applications. It provides a 'Universal Catalytic Large Atomic Model' to accelerate atomistic simulations in catalytic systems.

tools.name: ALF
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning Framework for machine-learned interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A framework developed by LANL for performing active learning to train machine-learned interatomic potentials. It automates the process of selecting configurations to improve potential accuracy efficiently.

tools.name: NeuralForceField
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based Neural Network Force Field implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Neural Network Force Fields, enabling the training and usage of neural networks for predicting atomic forces and energies in molecular systems.

tools.name: alchemical-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: Alchemical machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for developing and applying alchemical machine learning interatomic potentials, which allow for continuous interpolation between chemical species, useful for free energy calculations and materials design.

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for molecular discovery and property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed for molecular discovery, offering an sklearn-style interface for tasks such as molecular property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning.

tools.name: En-transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of E(n)-Equivariant Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A reusable PyTorch implementation of the E(n)-Transformer architecture, which incorporates attention mechanisms into E(n)-Equivariant Graph Neural Networks. It serves as a foundational building block for geometric deep learning in science.

tools.name: egnn-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of E(n)-Equivariant Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A widely used PyTorch library implementing E(n)-Equivariant Graph Neural Networks (EGNN). It provides efficient, equivariant layers for modeling 3D molecular structures and dynamics, serving as a core component for many AI4Science models.

tools.name: MolecularGNN_3Dstructure
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network for molecular property prediction using 3D structural information
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation that utilizes 3D molecular structures and graph neural networks to predict physicochemical properties of molecules.

tools.name: HDNNP
tools.one_line_profile: High Dimensional Neural Network Potential generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for constructing and training High Dimensional Neural Network Potentials (HDNNP) for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: M3GNet
tools.one_line_profile: Materials graph network with 3-body interactions and DFT surrogate
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network potential that incorporates 3-body interactions, serving as a universal IAP for materials and a surrogate model for DFT structural relaxation.

tools.name: maml
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for materials machine learning and descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for materials machine learning, providing tools for descriptors, machine learning force fields, and deep learning models tailored for materials science.

tools.name: mlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A framework and benchmark suite designed to evaluate and compare various machine learning interatomic potentials for materials.

tools.name: MACE-H
tools.one_line_profile: GNN prediction of electronic Hamiltonians
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model designed to predict electronic Hamiltonians in atomic orbital representation, incorporating many-body messages.

tools.name: NequIP
tools.one_line_profile: E(3)-equivariant graph neural networks for interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A code for building E(3)-equivariant interatomic potentials using graph neural networks, enabling high data efficiency and accuracy in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: pair_nequip
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS interface for NequIP potentials (Legacy)
tools.detailed_description: A LAMMPS pair style implementation allowing the use of NequIP machine learning potentials within LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: pair_nequip_allegro
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS pair styles for NequIP and Allegro potentials
tools.detailed_description: The updated LAMMPS interface for deploying both NequIP and Allegro deep learning interatomic potentials in large-scale molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: PaiNN-model
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of PaiNN model for interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: An efficient implementation of the Polarizable Atom Interaction Neural Network (PaiNN) model for constructing machine learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: QField
tools.one_line_profile: Touch optimized interface for QGIS field work
tools.detailed_description: A mobile GIS application designed for efficient field data collection, fully integrated with QGIS for geospatial research and surveying.

tools.name: NNPOps
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance operations for neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: A library providing optimized kernels and operations to accelerate the execution of neural network potentials, often used within the OpenMM ecosystem.

tools.name: orb-models
tools.one_line_profile: ORB forcefield foundation models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pre-trained machine learning force field models (ORB) for atomistic simulations and materials discovery.

tools.name: GAML
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic Algorithm Machine Learning for force field parameterization
tools.detailed_description: A software package that utilizes genetic algorithms to automate the parameterization of force fields for molecular simulations.

tools.name: charge_transfer_nnp
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network potential with charge transfer
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based interatomic potential that explicitly models charge transfer effects for more accurate atomistic simulations.

tools.name: FragNet
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable GNN for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network architecture designed for molecular property prediction that provides interpretability at multiple structural levels (fragments).

tools.name: ichor
tools.one_line_profile: Data management library for ML force field development
tools.detailed_description: A computational chemistry data management library designed to facilitate the workflow of developing and training machine learning force fields.

tools.name: e3tools
tools.one_line_profile: Building blocks for equivariant neural networks in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library providing modular components for building E(3)-equivariant neural networks, designed to work with e3nn and PyTorch. Developed by Prescient Design (Genentech), it facilitates the creation of geometric deep learning models for molecular and structural biology applications.

tools.name: MACE-Osaka24
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained MACE models for molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pre-trained Machine Learning Force Field (MACE) models provided by the Quantum Information and Quantum Biology division at Osaka University. These models serve as ready-to-use potentials for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: rPPG-Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for remote photoplethysmography (rPPG)
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for evaluating remote photoplethysmography (rPPG) methods. It provides tools for data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation of physiological signal extraction from video, supporting fair comparisons in biomedical signal processing research.

tools.name: VERTEX
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual Electrode Recording Tool for EXtracellular potentials
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based simulator for spatially realistic Local Field Potential (LFP) simulation in spiking neural networks. It allows researchers to model extracellular potentials generated by large populations of neurons.

tools.name: TorchANI-Amber
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for using ANI neural network potentials in Amber MD
tools.detailed_description: An interface developed by the Roitberg group that enables the use of ANI-style and other neural network interatomic potentials (NN-IPs) within the Amber molecular dynamics software suite. It bridges machine learning potentials with established MD engines.

tools.name: CUDA-MACE
tools.one_line_profile: CUDA accelerated implementation of MACE models
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance CUDA implementation for MACE (Machine Learning Force Fields) models, designed to accelerate inference and simulation tasks involving equivariant neural network potentials on GPU hardware.

tools.name: GotenNet
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient 3D Equivariant Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of GotenNet (ICLR 2025), a graph neural network architecture designed for efficiency and 3D equivariance. It is applicable to tasks involving 3D molecular structures and geometric deep learning.

tools.name: LorentzNet
tools.one_line_profile: Lorentz Equivariant Graph Neural Network for Jet Tagging
tools.detailed_description: An efficient Lorentz equivariant graph neural network designed for particle physics applications, specifically jet tagging. It respects the symmetries of spacetime (Lorentz symmetry) to improve performance on high-energy physics data.

tools.name: Simple-Equivariant-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of E(n) Equivariant Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A concise and accessible PyTorch implementation of E(n) Equivariant Graph Neural Networks (EGNN). It serves as a building block or reference for researchers developing geometric deep learning models for particle systems and molecules.

tools.name: QHFlow
tools.one_line_profile: DFT Hamiltonian prediction using flow models
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of QHFlow (NeurIPS '25), a machine learning model for predicting Density Functional Theory (DFT) Hamiltonians. It aims to accelerate quantum chemistry calculations by bypassing expensive self-consistent field iterations.

tools.name: ACANet
tools.one_line_profile: Activity-Cliff Awareness for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph learning framework designed to handle activity cliffs in molecular property prediction. It improves the robustness of QSAR models by explicitly addressing structurally similar molecules with large differences in potency.

tools.name: eqnn-jax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX implementations of equivariant GNNs (EGNN, SEGNN, NequIP)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of annotated implementations of popular equivariant graph neural networks (EGNN, SEGNN, NequIP) using JAX. It provides a high-performance codebase for researchers working on geometric deep learning in physics and chemistry.

tools.name: sGDML
tools.one_line_profile: Symmetric Gradient Domain Machine Learning model
tools.detailed_description: The reference implementation of the Symmetric Gradient Domain Machine Learning (sGDML) model. It is a machine learning method for constructing accurate and efficient force fields from ab initio molecular dynamics data, incorporating physical symmetries.

tools.name: Coronary-Mesh-Convolution
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh neural networks for artery wall hemodynamics
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of mesh neural networks for SE(3)-equivariant estimation of hemodynamic parameters on coronary artery walls. It applies geometric deep learning to biomedical fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: PAR-NeurIPS21
tools.one_line_profile: Property-Aware Relation Networks for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Property-Aware Relation Networks (PAR) for few-shot molecular property prediction. This tool addresses the challenge of predicting molecular properties with limited labeled data using meta-learning techniques.

tools.name: TensorFlow Quantum
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning. It integrates quantum computing algorithms and logic designed in Cirq with TensorFlow, enabling the development of quantum machine learning models for scientific discovery.

tools.name: mlff
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based library for machine learning force fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python library built on JAX for training and evaluating neural network force fields. It provides tools for developing machine learning potentials to accelerate molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: MDDatasetBuilder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to build reference datasets for NN potentials from LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A utility script designed to construct reference datasets for training neural network potentials by processing LAMMPS trajectory files. It streamlines the data preparation workflow for machine learning force fields.

tools.name: TorchMD-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Neural Network Potentials for molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: TorchMD-NET provides state-of-the-art equivariant neural network architectures (like ET-Transformer) for training interatomic potentials and force fields, integrated with the TorchMD ecosystem.

tools.name: GrouPy
tools.one_line_profile: Group Equivariant Convolutional Neural Networks library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for implementing Group Equivariant Convolutional Neural Networks (G-CNNs), which are essential for building symmetry-preserving models in scientific computing and geometric deep learning.

tools.name: ChemTrain
tools.one_line_profile: Training framework for Neural Network Potentials in JAX
tools.detailed_description: ChemTrain allows training of neural network potentials (NNPs) against various experimental observables (not just energies/forces) using differentiable molecular dynamics and customizable routines in JAX.

tools.name: DiffTre
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Trajectory Reweighting for potential learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for learning neural network potentials from experimental data using Differentiable Trajectory Reweighting, enabling the optimization of force fields to match macroscopic observables.

tools.name: Finetuna
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for ML potentials
tools.detailed_description: Finetuna automates the active learning cycle for training machine learning potentials, selecting configurations that maximize model improvement for efficient force field generation.

tools.name: ChipsFF
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation toolkit for universal ML force-fields
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit from NIST for evaluating and benchmarking universal machine learning force-fields, focusing on their applicability to diverse materials and chemical systems.

tools.name: NFFLR
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Force Field Learning Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by NIST for training and developing neural network force fields, facilitating the creation of ML potentials for materials science.

tools.name: SOAP-GP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction with SOAP kernels
tools.detailed_description: Implements Gaussian Process regression using the Smooth Overlap of Atomic Positions (SOAP) descriptor for predicting molecular properties.

tools.name: K-BERT (Molecular)
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-based BERT for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Knowledge-based BERT adapted for molecular property prediction, leveraging pre-trained language models for chemical tasks.

tools.name: GLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive graph learning for molecular interactions
tools.detailed_description: Implements an adaptive graph learning method for automated prediction of molecular interactions and properties, focusing on graph representation learning.

tools.name: MGSSL
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning (MGSSL) for molecular property prediction, utilizing motif-level information to enhance graph representations.

tools.name: Molecular-graph-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised learning for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: A semi-supervised learning framework combining BERT-style pre-training with molecular graph data for property prediction tasks.

tools.name: Meta-MGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Graph Learning for Molecules
tools.detailed_description: A meta-learning framework (Meta-MGNN) designed for molecular property prediction in few-shot scenarios, enabling effective learning from limited chemical data.

tools.name: AIMNet2
tools.one_line_profile: General-purpose neural network interatomic potential
tools.detailed_description: AIMNet2 is a fast, accurate, and transferable neural network interatomic potential capable of predicting energies and forces for a wide range of molecular systems, developed by the Isayev Lab.
